title: Single Of The Week: Holy Other – Touch
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/holyother.jpg "holyother")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/8520-single-of-the-week-holy-other-touch/attachment/holyother)

With every hiss, moan and snap comes a feeling of dread. There’s a comfort and warmth within the fear however, a fear that makes the sounds [**Holy Other**](http://www.soundcloud.com/holyother) produces so fucking hard to define; both sonically and emotionally. The music pleads to you through drawn out Rn’B samples and reverb-laden cries in the most infectious of ways. But **Holy Other**, there’s no need to plead: you already have me.

 [Touch](http://soundcloud.com/holyother/touch) by [HOLY OTHER](http://soundcloud.com/holyother)

The music pleads to you through drawn out Rn’B samples and reverb-laden cries in the most infectious \[…\]
